CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Lead__c != null, Lead__r.IsConverted == false),'Open', IF(AND(Opportunity__c != null,TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) != 'Unit Booked'),'Visit Done',IF(AND(Opportunity__c != null,TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) == 'Unit Booked'),'Booked','')))
CustomField.label: Prospect Stage
